column2: BRIEF-Spirit Realty Capital Says CEO Jackson Hsieh's FY 2019 Total Compensation Was $9.7 Mln vs $12.1 Mln In FY 2018 - SEC Filing April 24 (Reuters) - Spirit Realty Capital Inc: * SPIRIT REALTY CAPITAL INC SAYS CEO JACKSON HSIEHâ€™S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $9.7 MILLION VERSUS $12.1 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * SPIRIT REALTY CAPITAL INC SAYS FOR FY 2019, CEO PAY RATIO WAS 110.8 TO 1 Source : (bit.ly/2KskAH7) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Spirit MTA REIT Entered Separation And Distribution Agreement With Spirit Realty May 21 (Reuters) - Spirit MTA REIT: * SPIRIT MTA REIT - ENTERED SEPARATION AND DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH SPIRIT REALTY CAPITAL, INC - SEC FILING * SPIRIT MTA REIT - THE AGREEMENT GOVERNS RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN CO AND SRC SUBSEQUENT TO COMPLETION OF SPIN-OFF * SPIRIT MTA REIT-AGREEMENT GIVES FOR ALLOCATION BETWEEN CO &SRC OF SRC'S ASSETS, LIABILITIES AND OBLIGATIONS ATTRIBUTABLE TO PERIODS PRIOR TO SPIN-OFF Source text: (bit.ly/2J058Tl) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Spirit Realty Capital Announces Effectiveness Of SMTA REIT Form 10 Registration Statement May 10 (Reuters) - Spirit Realty Capital Inc: * SPIRIT REALTY CAPITAL ANNOUNCES EFFECTIVENESS OF SMTA REIT FORM 10 REGISTRATION STATEMENT * SPIRIT REALTY CAPITAL - SPIN-OFF IS CURRENTLY ANTICIPATED TO BE COMPLETED ON/ABOUT MAY 31, 2018 AND REMAINS SUBJECT TO CERTAIN CUSTOMARY CONDITIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Spirit Realty Capital Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of C$0.05 May 1 (Reuters) - Spirit Realty Capital Inc: * SPIRIT REALTY CAPITAL, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS * c * REAL ESTATE PORTFOLIO OCCUPANCY WAS 98.9% AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.84 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Spirit Realty Capital Reports Quarterly FFO Per Share $0.24 May 1 (Reuters) - Spirit Realty Capital Inc: * SEES 2018 PRO-FORMA AFFO OF $0.66 TO $0.68 PER SHARE, (EXCLUDING SEVERANCE CHARGES) * SEES 2018 CAPITAL DEPLOYMENT OF $400.0 MILLION TO $500.0 MILLION * SEES 2018 ASSET DISPOSITIONS OF $50.0 MILLION TO $100.0 MILLION * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.84 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $159.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: (bit.ly/2KsgBcd) Further company coverage:
